description: This file defines the IGuide interface within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. The interface provides methods for managing and retrieving TV guide information such as channels, programs, current program details, audio and subtitle languages, parental control settings, and notification registration. It also includes a nested INotification interface for event callbacks related to the guide, such as broadcasts, alerts, and parental control changes.

classes.name: IGuide
classes.description: An interface providing access to guide functionalities such as retrieving channel and program info, parental control, and notifications.

classes.name: IGuide::INotification
classes.description: An interface for receiving notifications related to guide events like broadcasts, alerts, and parental control changes.

methods.name: StartParser
methods.description: Starts the guide parser using the provided shell.

methods.name: GetChannels
methods.description: Retrieves the list of available channels as a string.

methods.name: GetPrograms
methods.description: Retrieves the list of current programs as a string.

methods.name: GetCurrentProgram
methods.description: Gets information about the current program for a given channel.

methods.name: GetAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available audio languages for a given program.

methods.name: GetSubtitleLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves available subtitle languages for a given program.

methods.name: SetParentalControlPin
methods.description: Sets the parental control PIN for a given parameter.

methods.name: SetParentalControl
methods.description: Enables or disables parental control for a specific setting.

methods.name: IsParentalControlled
methods.description: Checks if parental control is active.

methods.name: SetParentalLock
methods.description: Sets or clears a parental lock on a given item.

methods.name: IsParentalLocked
methods.description: Checks if a specific item is parental locked.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for guide events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

ctags.name: IGuide
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IGuide : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
